alert.note: Alert for Cooke (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:26PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cooke County through 300 PM CDT... At 225 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hubert H Moss Lake, or 11 miles northwest of Gainesville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Lindsay, Callisburg, Hubert H Moss Lake, Valley View and Marysville. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 490 and 503. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
